casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Larry Spencer HILL. No. 249P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of May 2004 by Defendant for Immediate Release:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of June 2004."
